flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I will lead you through the steps necessary to crop an image to the correct size, figure out what size photos will make up your mosaic, create the individual photos, then mount them on wall.
guide.introduction_rendered: I will lead you through the steps necessary to crop an image to the correct size, figure out what size photos will make up your mosaic, create the individual photos, then mount them on wall.

lines.text: I started with the size of the piece I wanted for the wall.  Since the wall it was going to end up on is quite tall, I wanted a tall photo that covered 4 feet of height.  I knew I was going to use 5x7 frames, because that's what we had, but 4x6 could work just as well (side note: IKEA no longer sells the 5x7 clip frames and may be phasing out the 4x6s; if you have to buy these individually at a frame store, this could get expensive).
